name: Detect Expertise
text: You can detect the mystic specialty of a foe.
prerequisites: Int 13; ability to cast detect chaos, detect evil, detect good, detect law, or detect magic.
benefit: When you use any of the spells listed in this feat’s prerequisites to detect a creature’s alignment or its magic, you have a chance of detecting what spellcasting expertise it has. After you observe a creature with the detect spell for 3 rounds, it must make a Will save (DC 10 + 1/2 your caster level + your Intelligence modifier). If it fails the saving throw, you learn what bloodlines, domains, hexes, schools, or mysteries (if any) the creature possesses. If the creature makes its save, it is immune to the effects of this feat for 24 hours.
mythicText: You can sense a creature’s magical abilities with just a mere glance.
mythicBenefit: You gain the benefit of Detect Expertise immediately (without needing to observe a creature for 3 rounds) when using the divinations listed in Detect Expertise. Non-mythic creatures cannot attempt a Will save to resist this effect.
text_zh: 你能够侦测到目标的施法特性。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，‘侦测混乱、侦测邪恶、侦测善良、侦测秩序’或者‘侦测魔法’能力。
benefit_zh: 当你使用此专长先决条件中列出的法术侦测一个生物的阵营或者法术时，你能够有机会侦测出他专精于哪种法术。在你用侦测类法术观察一个生物3轮后，他必须做一个DC为“10+1/2你的CL+智力修正”的意志豁免。如果他在豁免中失败，则你知道这个生物所拥有的血统、领域、法师学派、秘示域等（如果有）。如果这个生物通过了豁免，那么他在接下来的24小时中对这个专长免疫。
mythicText_zh: 仅仅一瞥，你就能了解到生物的魔法能力。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用侦测专精专长中列出的侦测法术时，你能够立刻得到侦测专精专长的好处（不需要观察一名生物3轮）。非神话生物无法尝试意志豁免来抵抗该效果。
